title: Better than the movies
description: Learn the best strategies to grow your online store in today's competitive market and increase sales.

title: Happy Place
description: A heartfelt romantic novel about two exes who pretend to still be together during an annual getaway, only to rediscover their feelings.

title: Beach Read
description: A witty romance about two writers with opposite styles who challenge each other to swap genres while spending the summer by the beach.

title: People We Meet on Vacation
description: A charming story of two best friends who reunite for one last vacation, confronting their past and the possibility of love.

title: Funny Story
description: A lighthearted romance about unexpected roommates whose fake relationship begins to blur into something real.

title: The Love Hypothesis
description: A bestselling romantic comedy about a PhD student who pretends to date a grumpy professor, only for sparks to fly.

title: Love on the Brain
description: A witty rom-com about a scientist forced to collaborate with her nemesis, discovering love and chemistry in unexpected ways.

title: Love Theoretically
description: A swoony romance about an ambitious physicist whose career and love life collide when she meets her rival.

title: Sometimes I Lie
description: The book is a psychological thriller about a woman in a coma who can hear everything around her, revealing secrets and lies as the story unfolds.

title: The Housemaid
description: A gripping thriller about a woman who takes a job as a housemaid in a wealthy family’s home, only to discover dark secrets behind closed doors.

title: The Teacher
description: A chilling psychological thriller where a teacher’s mysterious past collides with the secrets of their students and colleagues.

title: Tenant
description: A suspenseful story of a tenant who moves into an apartment building, only to uncover sinister truths about their neighbors and landlord.

title: The Crash
description: A fast-paced thriller following survivors of a deadly plane crash as they realize the disaster may not have been an accident.

title: His & Hers
description: A dark psychological thriller about two sides of a murder story, where both the journalist and detective may be hiding deadly secrets.

title: The Family Upstairs
description: A dark psychological thriller about a woman who inherits a house with a chilling history of mysterious deaths and cult-like secrets.

title: The Serpent The Wings of Night
description: A dark fantasy about a human girl who enters a deadly vampire tournament, where survival means power, love, and betrayal.

title: The Witcher
description: Follow Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter navigating a world of magic, politics, and destiny in this iconic fantasy series.

title: Shatter Me
description: A dystopian fantasy about a girl with a lethal touch, struggling between freedom, love, and rebellion against a cruel regime.

title: Destroy Me
description: A novella in the Shatter Me series told from Warner’s perspective, revealing his secrets, motives, and inner battles.

title: Unravel Me
description: The sequel to Shatter Me where Juliette struggles to harness her deadly power as war and betrayal loom closer.

title: Ignite Me
description: The explosive continuation of the Shatter Me saga, where Juliette must choose love, loyalty, and how to wield her strength to change the world.
